> ### Dr. Girisha G S
> Professor & Chairperson CSE
> Dr. Girisha G S is working as Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering and has done his PhD from VTU, Belagavi in the domain of Multimedia Data Mining. He has total of 24 years of academics experience. He has 25 publications in his credit including Eleven international peer reviewed journals and Eight international conference papers. He has given invited lectures on advanced microprocessor, Block chain Technology etc. in various Engineering colleges. He was involved in syllabus framing for the AMIETE courses. He is currently guiding five PhD students. He has worked as coordinator in various departmental and institute levels works including, mentoring, organizing conferences/workshops/FDP/Technical talks, ISO, NBA & NBA accreditation. His areas of research interest include Data Mining, Data Science and Block chain.

> ### Dr. Rajesh T. M
> Associate Professor
>   
>    
>   
> 
> #### Education:
>   * Dr. Rajesh T.M. completed his **Ph.D.** in January 2017 from the Dept. of CS&E, Jain University, Bengaluru. He carried out his research in the area of forensic crime detection in the digital image processing and pattern recognition domains.
>   * He pursued his **M. Tech**. in 2012 from the Dept. of CS&E, Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, VTU, Bengaluru.
>   * He did his **BE** in 2010 from the Dept. of CS&E, Bapuji Institute of Engineering & Technology, VTU, Davanagere, and is currently working as an assistant professor in the Department of CS&E, SoE, DSU
> 

> #### Experience:
> Dr. Rajesh T.M. has a total of 11+ years of experience in industry, research, and academic domains.
>   * He has two years of industrial experience at **IGATE Global Solutions Ltd.** , Bangalore. In IGATE, he worked as a software engineer for production support for a client (RTBA and Westpac Bank of Australia.
>   * He has one year of research experience as a research associate at **DSCE**. As a research associate, he has worked in the document image processing domain.
>   * **8+ years of teaching experience at the Dept. of**CS &E, SoE, and** **DS** U.**
> 

> #### Research,Patents & Publications
>   * Dr. Rajesh T.M has successfully guided **2 Ph. D scholars** and he is currently guiding **2 Ph. D research scholars** in DIP, PR, CV & ML domains.
>   * His Publications towards his research work includes - 
>     * **12 Indian patents** have been ** _published_** and **2 Australian patents** have been **_granted_** , **1 design patent** have been **_registered_** in the DIP, PR, ML, IoT, and computer vision domains. (**Total: 15 patents**)
>     * **Authored one textbook** in the forensic crime detection area (multilingual signature identification and verification in the forgery domain).
>     * **Edited** **two books** of ICICC conference proceedings, "Data Engineering and Intelligent Computing" and "Computer Communication, Networking, and IoT," both published in the LNNS series of Springer and indexed in **SCOPUS**.
>     * Published **4 book chapters** , **20 international journals** , **14 international conference publications** , and **2 national conference papers**. Out of which **18** publications are indexed in **SCOPUS** and **3** publications are indexed in **SCI**. (**Total: 40 publications**)
> 

> #### Research Interest:
> His area of interest in research includes Digital Image Processing, Pattern Recognition, Video Analytics, Computer Vision Data Analytics and IoT.

> ![George](https://dsu.edu.in/images/Engineering/CSE-dept/faculty/DrPraveen.jpg)
> ### Dr. Praveen Kulkarni
> Associate Professor
> Dr. Praveen Kulkarni is an Associate Professor in Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Dayananda Sagar University, Bengaluru. He received his Ph.D in 2021 from Dayananda Sagar University, Bengaluru. He conducted his study on A Novel Approach for Grading Human Emotions using Data Analytics. He holds an M.Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Bapuji College of Engineering, VTU, Davengere. He holds a BE degree in CS&E from the SKSVMA College of Engineering, VTU, Laxmeshwar. He has served as an Assistant Professor in the Department of CS&E in SIT Engineering Colleges, Mangalore and Christ University, Bangalore for 10+ years. He has 2 patents, 6 international journals, and 3 international conferences to his credit. Digital Image Processing, Computer Vision, and Data Analytics are among his research interests.

> ### Dr. Arunkumar Gopu
> Associate Professor
> Dr. Arunkumar Gopu is a highly accomplished and experienced faculty member with a strong background in cloud computing, fog computing, edge computing, bio-inspired algorithms, multi-objective optimization, and machine learning. He obtained his undergraduate degree in Information Technology from KS Rangasamy College of Technology, affiliated to Anna University and pursued his postgraduate in Computer Science Engineering at SRM University. Dr. Gopu further enhanced his expertise by completing his Ph.D. from VIT University, Chennai on thesis titled "Multi-Objective Virtual Machine Placement using Evolutionary Algorithms in Distributed IaaS Cloud".
> With nine years of valuable experience in academia, Dr. Gopu has made significant contributions to his field. He has published eight research papers in esteemed journals and conferences, showcasing his expertise and commitment to advancing knowledge.
> During his tenure at KL University, Dr. Gopu served as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for Amazon Web Services (AWS). As a course coordinator he efficiently managed a course with 1,400 students, demonstrating excellent coordination skills. Dr. Gopu actively engaged in upskilling students and preparing them for AWS certification exams. In his recent role at VIT University, Dr. Gopu led the High-Performance Computing (HPC) lab, ensuring maximum research output by implementing an open stack cloud platform. Dr. Arunkumar Gopu's rich expertise, research contributions, and leadership skills make him an invaluable asset to any academic institution. With a passion for teaching and a drive for research, he consistently strives to inspire students and contribute to the advancement of his field.

> ### Dr. Savitha Hiremath
> Associate Professor
> Dr. Savitha Hiremath is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering. She has completed her Bachelor of Engineering from Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering and Master of Engineering from UVCE, Bangalore University, Bengaluru. She got awarded a Ph.D from Bangalore University in the area of “Sentiment Analysis”. She has published around 13 research papers in International Journals, conferences and a Book chapter. She has filed and published three patents and also published a Book in Lambert publications. Her area of interest are Data Mining, Natural Language Processing and Data Analytics. She has more than 14 years of teaching experience and worked in institutions like PES University, CMR Institute of Technology. She has worked on Innovation and Entrepreneurship Projects with undergraduate students. She has given Tech talks on “Efficient Techniques for Sentiment Analysis”, “Exploratory Data Analysis” and a workshop on “Latex”.
